item.description:
This is going to be a crazy pub crawl with 4,000 expected revelers all throughout Boston bars. Team HOOLIGANS that myself and my friends set up for this meetup group and in collaboration with Central MA Singles. Tickets need to be purchased through the website in order to attend. We will crawl all around Faneuil Hall, starting at Ned Devine's at 11:00a.m., please show up at that time in order to register and receive our HOOLIGANS team shirts as well as other swag. Make sure when you purchase your tickets that you print them out and bring them with you.

Here's the website http://www.tenontours.com/irish-pub-challenge-boston/purchase-your-tickets/?hsCtaTracking=13955907-65e7-42ed-abb5-b1e95c0521a5%7Ca0f7cf9e-0d5e-4747-9aa4-f293f644a75c and click on TEAM "THE HOOLIGANS".
item.name: St. Patrick's Day Bar Crawl in Faneuil Hall
